Bash(cd C:/Workspace/Repositories/study/aicode/minicli2 && python -c "
from src.provider import GLMProvider
p = GLMProvider\(\)
try:
    resp = p.chat\([{'role': 'user', 'content': 'hi'}], stream=True\)
    print\('Response type:', type\(resp\)\)
    print\('Has __anext__:', hasattr\(resp, '__anext__'\)\)
    for i, chunk in enumerate\(resp\):
        print\(f'Chunk {i}:', chunk\)
        if i > 3:
            break
except Exception as e:
    print\('Error:', e\)
" 2>&1)

from src.provider import GLMProvider
p = GLMProvider\(\)
resp = p.chat\([{'role': 'user', 'content': 'hi'}], stream=True\)
print\('Is Generator:', isinstance\(resp, __import__\('typing'\).Generator\)\)
for i, chunk in enumerate\(resp\):
    print\(f'Chunk {i}:', chunk\)
    if i > 2:
        break
" 2>&1)
